Body:
"""
        Test that an InvalidField error gets raised when attempting to
        write a mac response with no mac data.
        """
stream = utils.BytearrayStream()
payload = payloads.MACResponsePayload(self.unique_identifier, None)
args = stream,
self.assertRaisesRegex(exceptions.InvalidField,
    'The mac response mac data is required', payload.write, *args)
